title: Man City 3-0 Bayern Munich: Pep Guardiola's side deliver statement Champions League win

description: Romelu Lukaku scores a late penalty as Inter Milan put themselves in a strong position to advance to the semi-finals of the Champions League after securing a deserved win away at Benfica.
